description: Contains the list of encounters that this message is about. This is not the encounters created as a result of sending the message. For those encounters, see MYC_CONVO_ENCS.

columns.name: THREAD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This is the visit encounter that this conversation is about.
